page.title: 09Playing Field, Middlezoy
page.content: Middlezoy Community Playing Field is quite big but does not have many facilities. It has only got goal posts and some slides and bars for children under 8 to climb. It has also got an unfinished village hall which has taken 2 years to get as far as it has. Some children play on an old tractor which has been left there. Some boys have tried to make a B.M.X. course but it has been wrecked. There has been some trouble with vandalism which has helped to delay completion of the hall. There is a cricket pitch in the middle where the cricket team plays. The village school also uses the field for sporting activities.
